fields.title: Dogs are the next SSRI
fields.content: We love dogs. They make you happy. Petting a dog will increase your serotonin levels. Get yourself a pup. But only if you're responsible and will take proper care of your furry friend. They need you just like you need them.

fields.title: French Polynesia: the next big thing!
fields.content: So many tourists. But in a good way! This place is so cool. You should go there on your next vacay.

fields.title: Pickleball, a sport for all!
fields.content: Everyone can play pickleball. It's really fun, way more fun than tennis. Because you don't have to run that much.
